faq-questions.question: What is this page for?
faq-questions.answer: This website serves to upload your Secondary School Professional Activities to the server for easy and systematic organization for SPŠT school in Trnava.

faq-questions.question: What does PČOZ-MS mean?
faq-questions.answer: Praktická Časť Odbornej Zložky - Maturitnej Skúšky is a form of assessment of the practical skills and competencies of a secondary vocational school student in their specific field of study, which is part of the final Maturita exam.

faq-questions.question: What is SOČ?
faq-questions.answer: Stredoškolská odborná činnosť is a Slovak competition where secondary school students between ages 15-21 work on and present projects they're interested in. It's a way to explore their passions and develop skills.

faq-questions.question: What if something doesn't work or I don't like something?
faq-questions.answer: In this case, you can open a new issue on my GitHub.

faq-questions.question: Who will see my SOČ project?
faq-questions.answer: Registered users will have access to a portion of your submitted SOČ, specifically the title and a short description. The complete documentation will be visible exclusively to teachers and the user who uploaded the SOČ.

faq-questions.question: How do I document SOČ project on this website?
What if I forget my account password?
faq-questions.answer: Don't worry, password recovery will (possibly) be available on this page.

faq-questions.question: What if I accidentally submit the SOČ project before I have finished it?
faq-questions.answer: In this case, you must ask the teacher you are working with to give you access again. However, you must be careful, because this option will only be available for a certain time.
